name: Garage Door Simulator
description:
PRESS THE DOWN ARROW TO CLOSE THE DOOR

This game contains flashing lights and jumpscares.

You just got home from a trip and are in your garage when it starts to open. Something is trying to get in. You need to keep the garage door shut to keep whatever it is out.

This is just a short little test I made as I've never made a real game before. It's not very good. Sorry if this concept is used in any other games, it's not necessarily the most unique idea.

Takes around 1-2 minutes to play
